title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin takes a look at the Packers coming up short in the playoffs recently and who's to blame for their early exits. He pushes back against a Hall of Fame basketball player's assertion that Giannis Antetokounmpo couldn't succeed in the old NBA. He also reacts to a new report about a franchise NFL quarterback's future with his team coming to an end. Plus, Chris Broussard from First Things First joins the show to play a new game with Colin, "Great Take or Let's Debate". 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
